scripts.dev: echo 'Choose: npm run dev:server or npm run dev:client or npm run docker:dev'
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:client
scripts.clean:server: cd server && npm run clean || true
scripts.clean:client: cd client && npm run clean || true
scripts.docker:prod:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build
scripts.db:generate: npm run prisma:generate_init && echo 'Database schema generated from Prisma. Use docker:rebuild to apply changes.'
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker volume rm dynamic-mcp_db-data || true && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build db && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up
